summary: Implemented a shared team data source with updated names and refactored OurTeamSection to render from it. However, the diff summary does not provide evidence that all other user-visible occurrences of the old names across the entire UI/pages have been updated or eliminated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace all user-visible occurrences of "Priya Sharma" with "Prayag Dhole" and "Rajesh Kumar" with "Sagar Dhole" anywhere these team members are displayed in the UI (no remaining occurrences in team listings/cards).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows updated names in the new shared team config and that OurTeamSection uses it, but it does not show a repo-wide replacement or updates to any other components/pages that might still hardcode the old names. Without evidence of searching/updating other potential render locations, we cannot confirm there are no remaining occurrences.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure every page/route that renders a team section shows the updated names (no page shows the old names).
missing_requirements.reason: Only OurTeamSection and the new config are shown as changed. The diff does not show updates to other pages/routes or other possible team section implementations (if any), so consistency across all pages that might include team info cannot be verified from the provided changes alone.
